channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Apple aims to keep iPhone 18 price flat in face of RAM shortage, Kuo says
item.description: Apple will try to avoid raising iPhone 18 prices "as much as possible" in the face of a global memory shortage, according to a report from supply chain analyst Ming-Chi Kuo. According to Kuo, Apple plans to "absorb the costs" of rising RAM prices, while at least keeping the iPhone 18's starting price steady. Kuo […]

item.title: L'Univers à l'écran au XXIe siècle : un livre sur une rencontre entre arts et sciences
item.description: En 1959, le chimiste britannique C. P. Snow a donné une mémorable conférence intitulée Les Deux Cultures (en anglais, The Two Cultures) dans laquelle il avançait la thèse qu'au moins de son temps, trop souvent la vie intellectuelle de l'ensemble de la société occidentale se divisait...

item.title: Samsung is making its next e-paper display from plankton — yes, really!
item.description: Samsung’s latest ‘weird’ world first is here — an e-paper display made from plankton.

item.title: Les meilleurs VTC électriques en 2026 : quel vélo tout chemin choisir ?
item.description: Vous cherchez un vélo électrique polyvalent, qui vous permette de vous déplacer en ville tout comme vous balader en forêt ? Un VTC électrique (Vélo Tout Chemin) vous permettra de tout faire sans effort. Voici notre sélection des meilleurs modèles de type VTC électrique.

item.title: Ulefone Armor 30 Pro rugged phone can handle all weather, offers dual screens, days of battery life, and you can save £160 if you act fast
item.description: Armor 30 Pro rugged phone is just £339 and delivers multi-day battery life, dual screens, and extreme durability.

item.title: Amazon says it is laying off 16,000 employees
item.description: This is Amazon's second layoff after the company cut 14,000 corporate jobs in October.

item.title: Apple TV offers first look at Ted Lasso season 4
item.description: Last year fans of Ted Lasso received the good news that the show would be returning for a fourth season, despite having referred to its third season as its "final" one. Now Apple TV has shared some still images and further confirmation that production is underway. As first shared by The A.V. Club, this latest batch of still images depicts the eponymous coach back in action, this time coaching a women’s soccer team. A description of the upcoming season shared with the outlet reads, “In season four, Ted returns to Richmond, taking on his biggest challenge yet: coaching a second division women’s ...

item.title: Google Chrome : cette nouvelle fonction pourrait bientôt ralentir votre PC
item.description: Google teste une nouvelle fonctionnalité censée accélérer l’ouverture de Chrome, mais qui pourrait aussi causer des ralentissements sur votre PC.

item.title: Les marchands liquident leurs stocks de smartphones pour la dernière démarque des soldes d’hiver ! Le top 20 des offres
item.description: La dernière démarque des soldes d'hiver est lancée ! Il ne reste donc plus qu'une semaine avant la fin des promotions programmée pour le 3 février. Il reste donc encore un peu de temps pour se décider sur le nouveau smartphone qu'on souhaiterait avoir en poche.

item.title: TikTok is suppressing ‘content critical of President Trump’ in the US, California governor claims – as investigation looks into whether it 'violates' state law
item.description: California Governor Gavin Newsom is launching a review of TikTok's potential violations after more users are reporting anti-Trump censorship.

item.title: The Fake Tweets About Alex Pretti Reek of Desperation
item.description: It's like you can't even trust the Facebook page "Man Stuff" for investigative journalism anymore.

item.title: Samsung brade ses produits les plus populaires juste avant la fin des soldes
item.description: Les meilleures promotions Samsung des soldes d'hiver sont listées ici. Du smartphone au téléviseur, en passant par les écrans PC ou les PC portables, vous trouverez votre bonheur pour renouveler votre matériel avant la fin de l'évènement.

item.title: Get the Disney+ and Hulu bundle for one month for only $10
item.description: The peak time for deals on streaming services — the holiday shopping season — has come and gone, but Disney is back with a fresh offer for the new year. New and eligible returning subscribers can get one month of the ad-supported Disney+ Hulu bundle for just $10. That's $3 off the usual monthly rate for the bundle, and more than 58 percent off if you consider the prices for each service individually (Disney+ at $12 per month and, separately, Hulu also at $12 per month). We'd be remiss if we didn't mention that this isn't quite as good as the Black Friday deal we saw last year, which offered th...

item.title: Google AI Plus vs ChatGPT Go : Gemini devient pas cher, OpenAI est très mal
item.description: Google lance une nouvelle formule d'abonnement plus accessible pour Gemini 3. Les offres payantes de ChatGPT prennent beaucoup de retard.

item.title: Motorola s’attaque à Xiaomi avec ces 3 nouveaux smartphones à moins de 350 €
item.description: Après l’annonce, il y a quelques semaines, d’une nouvelle gamme Signature et d’un nouveau modèle Razr Fold, Motorola annonce aujourd’hui trois nouveaux smartphones de sa gamme G. Une gamme accessible, avec des prix débutant à 189 € et pouvant grimper jusqu’à 319 € pour le modèle le plus haut de gamme.

item.title: The MCU Might Get to Start Using Sony’s Spider-Man Characters More Often
item.description: Plus, Ryan Reynolds might already be working on the next 'Deadpool' movie.

item.title: Apple’s Creator Studio May Be the Best Case to Ditch Your Adobe Subscription
item.description: If it's a measure of features for price, Creative Studio is one of the best options yet. Just ignore silly AI 'freemium' features in legacy apps.

item.title: AMD Ryzen 7 9850X3D CPU Review: Gaming’s Best Chip
item.description: This year’s Ryzen is still my top choice for PC games.

item.title: The Best Ski Helmets, Editor Tested and Reviewed (2026)
item.description: This is an essential item for all skiers and snowboarders. WIRED has tested the best helmets for all abilities and budgets.

item.title: Send Help is an ode to every worker who has had a bad boss
item.description: When it comes to director Sam Raimi's films, you have to go into the theater understanding that you're about to experience a piece of cinema that vacillates between being absolute batshit and utterly sublime. Though Send Help is much more grounded than the projects he's best known for, like The Evil Dead or Drag Me […]

item.title: Snap is turning its smart glasses team into its own company
item.description: Snap is launching a separate business for its upcoming Specs augmented reality glasses in a bid to lure new investors to the project. The new company, aptly named "Specs," will operate under Snap as a distinct subsidiary ahead of the long-awaited public launch of Specs glasses later this year. "Establishing Specs Inc. as a wholly-owned […]

item.title: Snap gets serious about Specs, spins AR glasses into standalone company
item.description: The social media company's smartglasses are set to be released to the public later this year.

item.title: Redwood attracts Google for its $425M Series E as AI power needs rise
item.description: Google is the latest investor to back Redwood Materials as the battery recycling startup scales a new energy storage venture to power AI data centers and other industrial sites.

item.title: ‘They toned back on the violence’: how new Prime Video movie The Wrecking Crew could have been even more explicit if it wasn’t for Amazon
item.description: Jason Momoa and Dave Bautista throw a fearsome punch in Prime Video’s The Wrecking Crew – but the new movie has still been ‘toned down’ by Amazon.

item.title: LinkedIn will now let you show off how good you are with AI tools
item.description: LinkedIn doesn't just want everyone to have a verification badge, it's also offering AI proficiency badges with select partners.

item.title: Wonder Man head writer explains why he 'didn't feel the need' to address the Marvel TV show's biggest mystery on Disney+
item.description: Wonder Man leaves its biggest mystery unresolved — and the Marvel TV show's co-creator says it's meant to be that way.

item.title: I tried Apple Creator Studio — and it feels like a return to Apple’s creative roots
item.description: Apple Creator Studio is the company’s newest app bundle — here are my first impressions.

item.title: LinkedIn will let you show off your vibe coding expertise
item.description: LinkedIn has long been a platform for showing off professional accomplishments. Now, the company is leaning into the rise of vibe coding by allowing users to show off their proficiency with various AI coding tools directly on their profiles.The company is partnering with Replit, Lovabl, Descript and Relay.app on the feature and is working on integrations with fellow Microsoft-owned GitHub as well as Zapier. LinkedIn has always allowed users to add various skills and certifications to their profiles. But what makes the latest update a bit different is that users aren't self-reporting their ow...

item.title: Snap is spinning off its AR glasses into a separate business
item.description: Snap’s augmented reality glasses business will now be its own entity, with the company establishing Specs Inc. as a wholly owned subsidiary. It will enable Snap to more easily secure investors and partnerships for its wearables, as well as to grow Specs into a distinct brand while running it within Snap Inc. As The Information reported in mid-2025, Snap was thinking of ways to raise outside money for its AR glasses to be able to better compete with Meta, which has a lot more money to spend on development. It was already considering spinning off the business back then.“Specs are launching at an...

item.title: Adieu les smartphones trop chers, Motorola lance les moto g17, un concentré de style dès 189€
item.description: Motorola renouvelle ses smartphones d'entrée de gamme et dévoile ses moto g17 et moto g17 Power, deux appareils identiques à part pour la batterie qui atteint 6000 mAh sur le Power.

item.title: Écran Amoled ultra lumineux pour moins de 250 euros, voici le Motorola moto g67
item.description: Motorola rafraîchit son catalogue avec le nouveau moto g67. Entre un écran AMOLED 1,5K particulièrement lumineux et une fiche technique équilibrée, le constructeur américain entend bien consolider ses positions sur le segment très disputé du milieu de gamme.

item.title: 20 millions de météores qui frappent l’atmosphère terrestre chaque heure : ce scénario redouté pourrait se produire en 2032 !
item.description: Peu avant Noël 2032, un astéroïde pourrait s’écraser sur la Lune. Les scientifiques imaginent déjà les données inédites auxquelles ils pourraient alors avoir accès. Mais certains pensent aussi au pire…

item.title: Ted Lasso season 4 hits Apple TV in the summer
item.description: One of Apple TV's biggest hits is returning later this year: the streamer confirmed that season 4 of Ted Lasso will premiere this summer. There's no firm date beyond that, but the announcement marks an important moment for the service, as the show, which is one of Apple TV's most popular series, has been dormant […]

item.title: « Trop c’est trop ! » : Ubisoft entre en guerre avec lui-même
item.description: La situation se détériore à vue d'œil chez Ubisoft. Quelques jours après la refonte annoncée par le patron Yves Guillemot, la société pourrait bien faire face au plus grand mouvement de grève de son histoire.

item.title: Amazon enterre Amazon One, le paiement par la paume de la main
item.description: La purge chez Amazon se poursuit. La charrette de licenciements annoncée aujourd'hui s'accompagne de la fermeture du réseau d'épiceries Amazon Go et Amazon Fresh, et plus étonnant, de l'arrêt de la technologie Amazon One qui permet de payer simplement en présentant la paume de sa main. Celle-ci était pourtant prometteuse.

item.title: Bluesky is testing ‘live’ features to take on X
item.description: Bluesky says it's planning to make the app feel more "live" this year as part of ongoing efforts to build a competent rival to Elon Musk's X platform. Announcing Bluesky's 2026 development roadmap, product head Alex Benzer said the platform is working to make feeds more interactive and timely during live events, alongside teasing improvements […]

item.title: LG OLED55C5 : le plus populaire des TV 4K chute à un prix inédit pour la fin des soldes d’hiver
item.description: La série C des TV OLED de LG est souvent l’option la plus intéressante pour goûter au savoir-faire de la marque. C’est l’équilibre entre performance et accessibilité. Aujourd'hui, il est possible d'en profiter pour moins de 900 euros durant les soldes d'hiver.

item.title: Il y a de belles affaires chez E.Leclerc pour la dernière démarque des soldes : les 10 offres à ne pas louper
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver 2026 touchent à leur fin, mais E.Leclerc propose encore une foule d’offres intéressantes. Smartphones, tablettes, montres connectées, téléviseurs… Voici celles qui ont retenu notre attention.

item.title: The 512GB Samsung P9 microSD Express card is $40 off right now
item.description:
If you're looking to expand the storage on your Switch 2, the 512GB Samsung P9 microSD Express card is on sale right now for 33 percent off, marked down to $80 from $120. With component prices skyrocketing these days, it's getting increasingly rare to see good storage on sale, and 512GB for $80 is a much better deal than you'll currently find directly from Nintendo.
The P9 boasts transfer speeds of up to 800MB/s, making moving games to the card that much faster. As for load times, in our testing we found that any microSD Express, the standard the Switch 2 requires, will offer roughly the sam...

item.title: Monter un PC gaming : nos recommandations des configurations PC gamer pour tous les budgets
item.description: Monter soi-même son PC de bureau gamer est la solution idéale pour avoir un équipement qui correspond parfaitement à ses besoins. Pour vous aider dans cette tâche, Frandroid vous accompagne pas à pas en vous conseillant les meilleurs composants pour la configuration PC gamer qu'il vous faut.

item.title: Our first look at Google's Android for PC interface leaks in a bug report
item.description: Last summer, Google announced that Android 16 would include a desktop interface built from Samsung DeX, a mirroring and phone integration tool for PC. Thanks to a (now permissions-restricted) bug report discovered on Google's Issue Tracker, we have what is almost certainly a first look at the Android-on-desktop project, codenamed Aluminium OS. First spotted by 9to5Google, the bug report was about Chrome incognito tabs and included two screen recordings. The description said the recordings were from an HP Elite Dragonfly Chromebook. The video shows a 'chrome://version/' page where one can see t...

item.title: UK wants to give web publishers a 'fairer' deal with Google's AI overviews
item.description: The UK’s Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) is recommending measures to give publishers more control over how their content is used in Google’s AI overviews. The aim is to “provide a fairer deal for content publishers, particularly news organizations,” the CMA’s chief executive Sarah Cardell said in a press release. With Google accounting for more than 90 percent of search inquiries in the UK, the CMA recently designated the company with “strategic market status” for search under the Digital Market Act. That allows the regulator to apply “conduct requirements” on Google to promote competi...

item.title: Pinterest reveals major job cuts as it shift focus to AI tools
item.description: Pinterest cuts 15% of its workforce and reduces office space as it looks to drive forward its AI strategy.

item.title: Strix Halo : pourquoi Intel n’ira pas concurrencer les meilleures puces mobiles d’AMD
item.description: Intel n'a aucune intention d'aller concurrencer AMD et ses puissantes puces Strix Halo. À la place, l'entreprise préfère s'en tenir au bon équilibre trouvé avec Panther Lake en termes de performances par watt... et c'est l'un des principaux cadres d'Intel qui le dit.

item.title: Need a rugged phone that can survive extreme weather and long outages? The Doogee Fire 7 delivers days of battery life, and it's $110 off right now!
item.description: Doogee Fire 7 rugged phone is just $249.98 and delivers days-long battery life, 5G performance, and extreme durability.

item.title: Anker's new 45W Nano charger with smart display is on sale for $10 off
item.description: Anker introduced a nifty little charger at CES 2026, which is a refresh of the pre-existing Nano Charger. It's already on sale for $30, which is a discount of $10 when you clip the on-page coupon on Amazon. The 45W charger includes a smart display that shows real-time data like power flow, temperature and charging status. It also features "fun animations to keep things cheerful." Anker says it can recognize what's being charged and automatically adjust certain metrics to ensure a longer battery lifespan. To that end, it works with just about everything. The company advertises that this charge...

item.title: Amazon licencie 16 000 employés de plus
item.description: Amazon s’apprête à lancer une deuxième vague de licenciements. Le géant de la vente en ligne voudrait supprimer environ 16 000 postes administratifs supplémentaires pour atteindre son objectif de 30 000 employés en moins.

item.title: Les meilleures offres tombent pour la dernière démarque des soldes d’hiver : le TOP 50 des deals à ne pas louper
item.description: Il ne faut pas se le cacher, la dernière démarque des soldes est souvent le moment où l'on trouve les meilleures offres, car les e-commerçants comme Amazon, Fnac, Darty ou encore Boulanger veulent écouler les derniers stocks. Avec cet article, vous serez sûrs de ne manquer aucun deal Tech intéressant.

item.title: Sony Bravia 5 Review: An Excellent Mid-Tier TV for Cinephiles
item.description: This mid-tier Sony comes with its highest-end processor, and that's a big deal for home theater nerds.

item.title: I’m Sorry, That ‘A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms’ Prosthetic Was How Big?
item.description: Ser Arlan of Pennytree made quite the impression in this week's episode, and now the show's prosthetics designer is dishing on the details.

item.title: Apple Creator Studio is now available: What's included, how much it costs and what it means for creators
item.description: Apple has been leaning harder on services for several years now. That part of the business brought in tens of billions of dollars in revenue last year alone, and the company says 2025 was a record year. With Apple Creator Studio, Apple is extending that strategy further into professional creative software. Apple Creator Studio is a new subscription bundle that packages several of the company’s pro apps under a single monthly or yearly fee. It launches on January 28 and includes a one-month free trial. The key shift is that some of these apps are now subscription-only on iPad, even as Apple con...

item.title: China finally approves the first batch of NVIDIA H200 AI GPU imports
item.description: China has agreed to import its first batch of NVIDIA’s H200 AI chips after the government initially rejected the idea, Reuters reported. Several hundred thousand H200 chips were approved for sale in the country following NVIDIA’s CEO Jensen Huang’s visit there last week, according to two people familiar with the matter. The US government allowed the sale of NVIDIA’s H200 processors to vetted and approved companies in China late last year. The first sales have been allocated mainly to three unnamed Chinese internet companies and the government is accepting applications for future approvals, ac...

item.title: Shokz OpenFit Pro review: Reducing distractions while keeping your ears open
item.description: Rarely does a set of open-fit earbuds actually impress me. I tend to find them underwhelming because overall sound quality is subpar compared to the more “traditional” in-ear models. Any promise of noise reduction, or a far-fetched claim of noise cancellation, usually doesn’t hold true. The first time I used the Shokz OpenFit Pro ($249.95) I was immediately met with better audio performance than I’d just experienced on Sony’s new LinkBuds Clip and noise reduction technology that actually lessened some distractions. These aren’t the perfect set of open earbuds, but they have a lot more to offer...

item.title: Boîte de réception | Iran, antivirus et Radio-Canada
item.description: Chaque mercredi, notre journaliste répond à vos questions en lien avec le numérique et les nouvelles technologies. Cette semaine, on se demande comment les États font pour débrancher l’internet, on remet en question l’importance des logiciels antivirus et on s’interroge sur le site web de Radio-Canada.

item.title: Volkswagen recalls 40,000 ID.4 electric cars over fire risk
item.description: Volkswagen has recalled approximately 40,000 of its ID.4 electric SUVs over battery fire hazard.

item.title: Shell Fragment Found Fitted With Strange Tag Sparks Internet Mystery
item.description: A snorkeler in Australia found a shell tagged with a strangely specific number, kickstarting an online mystery about its origins.

item.title: Silent Hill fans have a great excuse to check out Fatal Frame 2: Crimson Butterfly Remake as Koei Tecmo and Konami announce collaboration
item.description: Koei Tecmo announces Fatal Frame 2: Crimson Butterfly Remake demo and a collaboration with one of the best horror games of the decade.

item.title: The Magic: The Gathering Avatar The Last Airbender Beginner Box is down to a new record-low price on Amazon
item.description: The Magic: The Gathering Avatar The Last Airbender Beginner Box is down to $24.99 at Amazon, its lowest price ever for new players.

item.title: Netatmo relance ses icônes : thermostat et caméra reviennent en version « Original »
item.description: Netatmo, fleuron de la maison connectée, désormais intégré au sein du groupe Legrand, opère un retour aux sources stratégique. La marque vient de dévoiler sa nouvelle gamme « Original » qui remet sur le devant de la scène ses best-sellers : le thermostat intelligent et la caméra extérieure. Si la promesse de durabilité et d'économies est toujours là, cette nouvelle gamme marque une rupture avec les précédents produits. ...

item.title: Google Messages se dote d’un nouveau sélecteur de photos
item.description: L’application de messagerie de Google intègre un nouveau sélecteur de photos qui vous donnera rapidement accès à vos différentes collections.

item.title: The Lego Botanicals Flower Bouquet and Bouquet of Roses is $30 off at Amazon — save ahead of Valentines Day
item.description: As of Jan. 28, the Lego Botanicals Flower Bouquet and Bouquet of Roses bundle is on sale at Amazon for $83.99, 30% off its bundle list price of $119.98.

item.title: Test du iRobot Roomba Max 705 Combo : deux semaines à l’essai
item.description: iRobot joue gros. Après avoir régné sans partage, la marque américaine s'est fait doubler sur l'IA et le lavage par des Roborock ou des Dreame survoltés. Le Roomba Max 705 Combo veut prouver qu’on peut encore innover avec un système de rouleau-serpillère inédit et une puissance d'aspiration de 13 000 Pa.

item.title: Amazon layoffs today: Tech giant slashes more jobs ‘in a world that’s changing faster than ever’
item.description: The Seattle-based company said it will cut about 16,000 additional roles as part of its ongoing effort to reduce layers and remove bureaucracy. It’s been a brutal week when it comes to layoffs.

item.title: 'The current situation is extremely serious' — Zotac warns that graphics card makers could be wiped out by memory crisis
item.description: The RAM crisis looms large in the PC hardware market, and now a graphics card maker has issued a warning for consumers.
